short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Well Helloooo Dear, I'm your NFT Nanny. I'm a fun utility that will help you stay safe while browsing the web looking to mint NFT's!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Well Hellloooooo Dear, I'm your NFT Nanny. I'm a fun utility that will help you stay safe while browsing the web looking to mint NFT's! 

Simply install the extension then navigate to the NFT website you're thinking of minting an NFT from. Once the page has loaded open the NFT Nanny extension and click "Check this site". The URL of your current site will be checked against our database of verified NFT minting websites and provide you with a status. We will advise is we know the site to be GOOD, BAD or UNKNOWN.

The list of URL's used to provide this service has been created and maintained from our participation in the NFT space. We are not supported or affiliated with any one chain or any one NFT project. You should not rely on this tool alone. Do your research! Don't get caught up in the hype, don't let FOMO get the better of you!

Stay Safe!
